creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: central necklace band has organic design with two central dragons and small oval mirror; hanging from bottom are seven long and six short hanging strands of bells; fish, lotus, horns and other types of designs cut from thin sheets of silver and joined together with small chains of silver
title: Necklace
